name: NavigationMenu
description: Mega-menu style horizontal navigation with dropdown content panels and smooth transitions

accessibility.screenReader: Root has role=navigation with 'Main' label. Triggers use roving tabindex for horizontal navigation. Dropdowns are announced when expanded. Links within content are focusable.
knownLimitations: Complex mega-menus may require additional ARIA for optimal screen reader experience

recommendedUsage: Use for main site navigation with multi-level content. Configure hover delays for appropriate interaction timing. Include viewport for animated content transitions.
antiPatterns: Do not use for simple link lists - use a standard nav element. Avoid excessive nesting. Do not hide primary navigation items in dropdowns without clear triggers.
